overview: A drama short film that follows 12-year-old Olives first day at a new school. Throughout the school day mean girl Nina is quick to harass Olive for having two mothers. Fortunately, the quirky outcast, Frankie stands up to this injustice, making Nina aware of her unacceptable behaviour. Frankie and Olive begin a beautiful friendship as they go grab hot chips together after school.
title: Hot Chips
